title: i remember last season when i saw a gold border in silver it was a little scary
body:
this season if you see a plat border in silver you might as well put 0 effort into the match because you already know who is about to start hardcore feeding.

to those who don't get it im calling people with plat borders in silver level trash. 

fuck you people

replies.body: Same with Silver borders in Plat, man.

I disagree. If you see a plat border in silver, you can assume that guy was boosted or lucky or whatever reason. You see a silver border in plat, you can assume he carried himself by his bootstrap and still has potential to be better than the average plat player.
Um...actually Silver borders in Plat may be just as boosted as the other way around.

OP's logic is actually wrong. He/she is implying that seeing a plat border in silver is somehow different this season (due to DQ). It's actually not different, as anyone with a plat border got plat LAST season (before DQ). This means that a plat border in silver means just regular old boosting (not DQ), a lot of luck, or just straight up not giving a fuck about ranked this season (all of which are completely valid non-DQ reasons).
Carried himself by his bootstrap? In Dynamicboost Queue?

Or a support main that got shoved into that match due to lack of supports in general. I'm a Silver support, play ranked solo only, and I get placed in games with golds and plats with increasing frequency. Must mean people are giving up on support.

Yeah when reworks buff support brand who was already too strong, when adc's only seem to get less intelligent, when team backs up clearly unintelligent ADC instead of a solid support, when enemy support can run Leblanc and never build support items then for some reason people start quitting the support role.
Or at least that is a few of the reasons I stopped maining it. Used to be able to carry as sona or morg with only 1 other person being anything above average. Could essentially 2v5 carry a game if playing at my best. Innovated support morg a season before anyone else and would 2v3 beat the crap out of enemy bot despite enemy jungler camping as long as my ADC wasn't total trash. Innovated support but before he was the rage too and support Shen before his 2recent fads in bot. But when adc's are too dumb to be carried, when they blame you all game long, when team backs them instead of you, or when you can snowball bot only to get camped by 4 all game while mid top and jungle refuse to help you and they still manage to feed then yeah there's not much motivation to play support. So I can see how you get in such high level games with everyone leaving the role.

Like that guy who was only playing in premades with one champion and in each and every one of those games had shitty KDA anyway, but for some reason after 3 years of being Bronze went to Plat in an instant... still playing like shit.

No, unless I'm proven otherwise, I will always assume a person who got anything above Silver in this season was boosted.

> [{quoted}](name=CheesecakeTheCat,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=nKFEMXWy,comment-id=00080001,timestamp=2016-09-09T16:42:39.390+0000)
>
> I disagree. If you see a plat border in silver, you can assume that guy was boosted or lucky or whatever reason. You see a silver border in plat, you can assume he carried himself by his bootstrap and still has potential to be better than the average plat player.

thats what i implied 

"plat" players in silver are garbage
I was talking to Vistha ;-;
That usually just means that they were boosted this season instead of last.
Which is the whole point, I reckon.

> [{quoted}](name=Vistha Kai,realm=EUNE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=nKFEMXWy,comment-id=0008,timestamp=2016-09-09T15:32:15.718+0000)
>
> Same with Silver borders in Plat, man.

I'm plat5 with a silver border but I only dynaQ'd once when I was back in Silver 3...and that was only until Silver 2 cause my teammates sucked, where it hardly matters. I soloQ'd the rest of the way to plat. Hit plat 3 before bad luck with teammates started fucking my matches up hardcore.

Chill.

I run into Diamonds in normals that make Bronze players look like LCS material.
Sad times.

> [{quoted}](name=Edgeberry,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=nKFEMXWy,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-09-09T12:06:19.684+0000)
>
> I run into Diamonds in normals that make Bronze players look like LCS material.
> Sad times.

because people dont tend to tryhard in normals and pick champs they cant play.
I am a horrible lee sin for example and I will play him in normals and feed my ass off, doesnt mean just because people are diamond they have to dumbster you with every champion pick ( and they still do in 90% of the cases anyway ~).
I am best Lee Sin Uganda

> [{quoted}](name=Eedat,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=nKFEMXWy,comment-id=000100010000,timestamp=2016-09-09T14:01:58.424+0000)
>
> I am best Lee Sin Uganda

Can confirm. Will clarify that this is because he happens to be the only person in Uganda with a computer.
http://i.imgur.com/6xkQgXL.gif?noredirect
Hey now, Uganda has an entire space program and are even building a space shuttle.

> [{quoted}](name=BootyLordRengar,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=nKFEMXWy,comment-id=00010001000000000002,timestamp=2016-09-09T19:26:38.501+0000)
>
> Hey now, Uganda has an entire space program and are even building a space shuttle.

Well they have at least one computer now. Why shouldn't they have other nice things?

> [{quoted}](name=Mr Broken Wings,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=nKFEMXWy,comment-id=00010001,timestamp=2016-09-09T12:31:15.690+0000)

what about those players that are diamond and are playing someone who they have rank 7.

> [{quoted}](name=Edgeberry,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=nKFEMXWy,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-09-09T12:06:19.684+0000)
>
> I run into Diamonds in normals that make Bronze players look like LCS material.
> Sad times.

Normals don't count

Why not that diamond border should mean that you at least know not to dive turret at lvl1 whilst being 1v2
Or never ward or never look minimap or make generally dumb decisions

yet it happens 

ALOT

sucking with a champ sure we all do that when we play it for the first time but game knowledge isn't affected by that . . .

so yes normals do count
no they don't. for all you know they could be boosted.
which is what i was implying {{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}

> [{quoted}](name=Edgeberry,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=nKFEMXWy,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-09-09T12:06:19.684+0000)
>
> I run into Diamonds in normals that make Bronze players look like LCS material.
> Sad times.

Diamond here. Guilty of this.

Also I happen to have a challenger border... Does this make it worse?
Boosted animals.
I have seem quite a few plats in my silver gmes, not smurfs but legit plats this and last season. I can't even queue with them yet matchmaking puts them against and with me.
Most plat borders I play with are usually the ones carrying the team. {{summoner:4}}

IIRC, the borders are from the previous season.

If they have a Platinum border, then wouldn't they have reached it in Season 5 before this whole Dynamic Queue kerfluffle devalued rankings?

> [{quoted}](name=EndlessSorcerer,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=nKFEMXWy,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2016-09-09T14:11:07.784+0000)
>
> IIRC, the borders are from the previous season.
> 
> If they have a Platinum border, then wouldn't they have reached it in Season 5 before this whole Dynamic Queue kerfluffle devalued rankings?

if you were plat last season ending up in silver elo

just uninstall.

> [{quoted}](name=notmarked,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=nKFEMXWy,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2016-09-09T14:12:54.172+0000)
>
> if you were plat last season ending up in silver elo
> 
> just uninstall.

Well to be fair it seemed after soft reset a lot of plat players dropped into silver elo. However, if you still find yourself in silver elo after a good number of games then yea probably uninstall or stop getting boosted.
I'm unranked garbage who sucks at this game should I uninstall for being bad?

>if you were plat last season ending up in silver elo

l2read
I did read, I'm worse than those boosted players thus I was asking if I should uninstall due to lack of skill.

Boosting is not something that just started. It's surprisingly common in previous seasons. The reason people are outraged is because dynamic queue basically endorsed and enforced getting boosted as the best way to climb

> [{quoted}](name=CheesecakeTheCat,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=nKFEMXWy,comment-id=00030001,timestamp=2016-09-09T16:43:58.032+0000)
>
> Boosting is not something that just started. It's surprisingly common in previous seasons. The reason people are outraged is because dynamic queue basically endorsed and enforced getting boosted as the best way to climb

Getting boosted by a duo (one other person) wasn't always gonna work out, but if 2 or more people come together to carry a shitlord they will probably succeed.
When you see Silver Border in your Plat 1 Promos and you know, you should just go afk.

http://na.op.gg/summoner/userName=Bladerunner7777

?

The saddest thing I have ever seen in League was in a normals game:

The person I played against was using Hextech Annie, was diamond in season 5, and was bronze halfway through season 6

It's these people that make LoL free to play

implying that hasnt been a thing plat players *have* been "boosted trash" for the longest time.

though more of these coming next season? nothing new here.

There are circumstances in which people used to be a higher rank during the last season but weren't able to keep playing, or that the person simply went away. I know a friend who was plat and then went into the army and came back to be silver.

I was in mid silver last season and was freaked out by the shiny gold borders. 

My normal mmr is so freaking wack from summer binge playing now that I'm 80% of the time playing with diamonds or even a challenger or two so ranked is a lot less stressful. Got to gold 1 and climbing.

I had a Diamond border player On High Gold low Plat 

Might as well AFK

At least try to give him/her some solid advice and support. Something like 9% of players are still willing to learn from others instead of calling you toxic for trying to help them play better and make good decisions. And even if not, you or someone else can still snowball and carry possibly.
I've won with idiots for bot, a decent mid that was just having a rough early game and a mediocre jungler. You can too.
plats some times can be called dirty copper.
Lol saw a bronze 1 with plat 3 border....
I have no borders and am in Gold 4 :D

Lol, it's the platinum curse.
That's what my friends and I refer to it as. :3
